Container.Name: FreePBX-16
Container.Overview: Container by tiredofit https://github.com/tiredofit/docker-freepbx This will build a container for FreePBX 16- A Voice over IP Manager for Asterisk. Upon starting this image it will give you a turn-key PBX system for SIP calling. This Container uses tiredofit debian:stretch as a base.

Volume.description: where you will put your certs

Variable.Name: ADMIN_DIRECTORY
Variable.description: What folder to access admin panel - Default /admin

Variable.Name: DB_EMBEDDED
Variable.description: Allows you to use an internally provided MariaDB Server e.g. TRUE or FALSE

Variable.Name: DB_HOST
Variable.description: Host or container name of MySQL Server e.g. freepbx-db

Variable.Name: DB_PORT
Variable.description: MySQL Port - Default 3306

Variable.Name: DB_NAME
Variable.description: MySQL Database name e.g. asterisk

Variable.Name: DB_USER
Variable.description: MySQL Username for above Database e.g. asterisk

Variable.Name: DB_PASS
Variable.description: MySQL Password for above Database e.g. password

Variable.Name: ENABLE_FAIL2BAN
Variable.description: Enable Fail2ban to block the bad guys - Default TRUE

Variable.Name: ENABLE_FOP
Variable.description: Enable Flash Operator Panel - Default TRUE

Variable.Name: ENABLE_SSL
Variable.description: Enable HTTPd to serve SSL requests - Default FALSE

Variable.Name: ENABLE_XMPP
Variable.description: Enable XMPP Module with MongoDB - Default FALSE

Variable.Name: HTTP_PORT
Variable.description: HTTP Listening Port - Default 8085

Variable.Name: HTTPS_PORT
Variable.description: HTTPS Listening Port - Default 4443

Variable.Name: FOP_DIRECTORY
Variable.description: What folder to access FOP - Default /fop

Variable.Name: RTP_START
Variable.description: What port to start RTP Transmissions - Default 18000

Variable.Name: RTP_FINISH
Variable.description: What port to end RTP Transmissions - Default 20000

Variable.Name: UCP_FIRST
Variable.description: Load UCP as web frontpage TRUE/FALSE - Default TRUE

Variable.Name: TLS_CERT
Variable.description: TLS Certificate to drop in /certs for HTTPS if no reverse proxy

Variable.Name: TLS_KEY
Variable.description: TLS Key to drop in /certs for HTTPS if no reverse proxy

Variable.Name: WEBROOT
Variable.description: If you wish to install to a subfolder use this. Example: /var/www/html/pbx Default '/var/www/html' ADMIN_DIRECTORY and FOP_DIRECTORY may not work correctly if WEBROOT is changed or UCP_FIRST=FALSE
